com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor
Class TransactionMonitor

java.lang.Object
  com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.AbstractMonitor
      com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.AbstractCompositeMonitor
          com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.TransactionMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompositeMonitor, Monitor
public class TransactionMonitor
extends AbstractCompositeMonitor

A monitor for transactions. Transactions implicitly have durations. In order to prevent instrumentation errors from showing failing transactions as successful, TransactionMonitors assume that a transaction failed unless success is called.

Constructor Detail

TransactionMonitor

public TransactionMonitor(java.lang.String name)
Creates a new transaction monitor with the provided name. The monitor is marked as failed by default. Also, the start time of this transaction is noted, thereby starting the stop watch.

Parameters:
name - the name of the monitr

TransactionMonitor

public TransactionMonitor(java.lang.String name,
                          MonitoringLevel monitoringLevel)
Creates a new transaction monitor with the provided name and monitoring level. The monitor is marked as failed by default. Also, the start time of this transaction is noted, thereby starting the stop watch.

Parameters:
name - the name of the monitor
monitoringLevel - the monitoring level

TransactionMonitor

public TransactionMonitor(java.lang.String name,
                          java.util.Map inheritedAttributes)
Create a new transaction monitor with the provided name and inherited attributes. The monitor is marked as failed by default. Also, the start time of this transaction is noted, thereby starting the stop watch.

Parameters:
name - the name of the monitor
inheritedAttributes - the collection of inherited attributes

TransactionMonitor

public TransactionMonitor(java.lang.String name,
                          MonitoringLevel monitoringLevel,
                          java.util.Map inheritedAttributes)
Create a new transaction monitor with the provided name, monitoring level and inherited attributes. The monitor is marked as failed by default. Also, the start time of this transaction is noted, thereby starting the stop watch.

Parameters:
name - the name of the monitor
monitoringLevel - the monitoring level
inheritedAttributes - the collection of inherited attributes

TransactionMonitor

public TransactionMonitor(java.lang.Class klass,
                          java.lang.String method)
Create a new transaction monitor using the provided class and method to generate a name. The monitor is marked as failed by default. Also, the start time of this transaction is noted, thereby starting the stop watch.

Parameters:
klass - the class that we're monitoring
method - a string containing the method name that we're monitoring

TransactionMonitor

public TransactionMonitor(java.lang.Class klass,
                          java.lang.String method,
                          MonitoringLevel monitoringLevel)
Create a new transaction monitor using the provided class and method to generate a name, with the provided monitoring level. The monitor is markedas failed by default. Also, the start time of this transaction is noted, thereby starting the stop watch.

Parameters:
klass - the class that we're monitoring
method - a string containing the method name that we're monitoring
monitoringLevel - the monitoring level

TransactionMonitor

public TransactionMonitor(java.lang.Class klass,
                          java.lang.String method,
                          java.util.Map inheritedAttributes)
Create a new transaction monitor using the provided class and method to generate a name, with the provided inherited attributes. The monitor is markedas failed by default. Also, the start time of this transaction is noted, thereby starting the stop watch.

Parameters:
klass - the class that we're monitoring
method - a string containing the method name that we're monitoring
inheritedAttributes - the collection of inherited attributes

public void failedDueTo(java.lang.Throwable e)
Marks this transaction as having failed due to the supplied Throwable.

Parameters:
e - the Throwable that caused the failure

done

public void done()
Stops the stop watch for this monitor. Delegates to AbstractMonitor.process().
